summary: im sorry but i wanted rhodey to be peters mentor in ffh instead of happy. not only because we'd have more content from the only...
body: im sorry but i wanted rhodey to be peters mentor in ffh instead of happy. not only because we’d have more content from the only reasonable person in the mcu as a whole, but also because fury would go “peter youre the only one that can help save the entire planet alone” and rhodey would just raise his eyebrow, say “so youre an idiot huh?”, call up carol and strange to fix the mess and give peter a military encrypted phone so even fury cant call him up, say “the world doesnt need another iron man, but we sure as hell need a peter parker and no one can do the job of being him like you do, now go have fun with your friends” and i think that would be a better movie for all of us

summary: Valkyrie is queen of New Asgard now so she probably has lots of responsibilities but I don't see why Fury can't be like, "Hey...
body: Valkyrie is queen of New Asgard now so she probably has lots of responsibilities but I don’t see why Fury can’t be like, “Hey can you come help the Spider kid out?” I mean I don’t know how fast a Pegasus flies but the train rides don’t take too long lol.

summary:
“In the comic books, what’s great about it is they’re just mashing together all the time 

—

 and it’s awesome! And, you know,...
caption: “In the comic books, what’s great about it is they’re just mashing together all the time — and it’s awesome! And, you know, I still think, one day, there may be an ability to do it.” - Hugh Jackman on Wolverine appearing in a Spider-Man film 🎞️

reblog.comment: “In the comic books, what’s great about it is they’re just mashing together all the time — and it’s awesome! And, you know, I still think, one day, there may be an ability to do it.” - Hugh Jackman on Wolverine appearing in a Spider-Man film 🎞️

blog.name: dr-archeville
blog.title: Doktor Archeville's Laboratory
blog.description:
Hi!  I am a fat 40-something white introvert in NC.  I worked in the NCSU Libraries for 13 years, then was an insurance agent working with Aflac (quack!) for about 9 months, and currently work as a substitute teacher in Roxboro & a repairer/maintainer of sewing machines out of my home.
My preferred pronouns are he/him/his; my preferred nicknames are Doc or Dok, or Science Squid (or Jon).

I am a fan of... things.  So many things.
* Comics (DC Comics, Marvel Comics)
* Tabletop RPGs (Dungeons & Dragons/D&D/DnD, Eclipse Phase, GURPS, Pathfinder, Shadowrun, World of Darkness) (My OCs, my games)
* Video Games (Elder Scrolls series, Fallout series, Minecraft)
* Podcasts (Binging with Babish, Critical Role)
* Webcomics (Order of the Stick, Oglaf, SMBC, Schlock Mercenary, xkcd)
* Geek Culture /  Geek Life /  Misc. Geekery (including memes)

Basically, if it's got cosplay, fantasy, horror (esp. body horror and zombies), science (or SCIENCE!) & sci-fi, steampunk, or superheroes (or supervillains), I'll probably love it.

I also try to keep up with actual science and technology, especially body modification and transhumanism.
I also blog about libraries and library- & librarian-related things (including books), in part because I'd worked in a library for thirteen years, and about education (especially education in NC and education in America) due to my work in academic libraries and as a substitute teacher.  And about language and linguistics, as those fascinate me.
Also about jobs and job hunting, since I've been unemployed or underemployed for an uncomfortably long time, and we could all use a little help there.
I also enjoy cooking (and food), which is a type of science.  Here are some recipes I've collected.

This being the internet, I also reblog posts with cute animals.  I'm especially fond of bats.  And squid, cuttlefish, and other cephalopods. While I'm listing animals, I may as well provide a link to my cat posts.  It is the internet, so there are a lot of them.

I'm a big fan of/believer in people being themselves, and of consenting adults being able to do whatever they want however they want with whoever they want, no matter what others think.  (I.e., body positivity, sex positivity).  I try to keep this blog SFW -- the only porn I'll be posting here are food porn and technology porn -- but I do sometimes talk about sex (esp. sex education) and burlesque (there are some great burly troupes in the Triangle & Triad area).

I struggle with mild depression and anxiety issues, so sometimes my blog may get a bit maudlin.  But I also try to give advice on dealing with those, too.
-----------------------
Things I've Liked (Note: May contain some NSFW posts)
My Tumblr Crushes
My personal blargings
About Me / It Me
Getting To Know Me
My TMI Tuesday blargings
My Feels

Conventions!
* Animazement
* ConCarolinas
* ConTemporal
* Cosplay America
* Dragon*Con / Dragon Con

My Face
My Facebook
Art-related blargings
Music-related blargings
Most Fridays nights I’m at the Retro Film shows at the the Carolina Theatre in Durham.  Come join me!

tags: a fun post i decided to make
summary: You know I just realized something when I looked closely at these covers, back to back. And this is my interpretation, so you...
body:
You know I just realized something when I looked closely at these covers, back to back. And this is my interpretation, so you don’t have to agree. But anyways, in the Amazing Spider-Man #601 variant cover, it seems like MJ is irritated as Peter leaves out of the window to stop either a crime or(in my opinion) to just get away from MJ for a while. But in the 2nd variant cover for the Black Cat comic, Peter is swinging/arriving at Felicia’s window as Felicia awaits with a naughty grin. It’s crazy the things you notice when you pay close attention to detail, lol. Maybe Peter is excited to see Felicia or is arriving at her place because she called him? Who knows. But my personal headcanon is, that after tired of being with Mary Plain, Peter leaves her behind and swings his way through the town, to the apartment of his ex , Felicia Hardy. To reignite the flame, so to speak😅😏😎. This post was probably not something anyone asked, but it was the one you all secretly wanted😂

@animesshadow @ladyingreen7 @rhdz23

title: day #7 - laser tag
body:
• pairing: Peter Parker x reader
  • category: fluff
  • words: 540+
  • synopsis: he takes you lasertagging and kisses you in a corner

day #7: “are you in?” from @ibwhellospring ‘s Spring Short Story Writing Event. This is for the anon who wanted some Peter fluff <3 

The bell has just rung, announcing the beginning of your lunch break, when all of a sudden Peter slammed a flier on your desk. You raised an eyebrow in suspicion at his wide grin.

“So, are you in?”

“Before I say yes and get myself into one of your messes,” you frowned, “I need more info, Parker.”

He snickered at your reply and nodded at the flier. “I’m talking about this!”

You glanced up at him in confusion after seeing what he was talking about. “Laser tag tournament?” Since when did Peter like this kind of stuff?

“I know what you’re thinking, y/l/n,” he snorted, “Laser tagging isn’t exactly my style, it’s true. But  if you’ll read the flier carefully, you’ll notice that it’s Star Wars themed!”

You sighed. “It was Ned idea, wasn’t it?”

Peter’s expression immediately answered your question. But then again, were you truly able to say no to him when he gave you those beautiful puppy eyes? Clearly, he was going to win this from the start, ever since you had laid eyes on his light brown curls and his soft smile.

“Pretty please?” he started begging, and he would’ve sounded pathetic if he wasn’t so cute. “Ned is really invested and we need one more person on the team.”

“Why do I have to do it?!” you protested in fake annoyance, and in all response, he flashed a smug grin at you.

“Cause you’re my favourite person and it’s not as fun if you aren’t there.”

“Alright…” You rolled your eyes, trying to hide the blush on your cheeks and the satisfied smirk plastered on your face.

Long story short, the day later you were running frantically in a dark room trying not to get shot by your classmates while simultaneously trying to hit moving targets in all that fake fog. This wasn’t exactly your idea of fun, but it wasn’t that bad. When you managed to hit someone it was actually great.

Too bad you were terrible at staying focused.

You heard a sound right behind you and turned, but you hadn’t enough time to aim. Just as you were about to be eliminated, you felt something - or someone - pushing you in a corner.

“Stay down!”

It was Peter. Your hero. He had ‘saved’ you just in time, and even though it was a dumb game you felt the adrenaline rushing through your veins. You loved that feeling of being capable to do anything.

It took you a moment to notice the look on his face. Peter was staring at you, the psychedelic neon lights making his hazel irises gleam in the dark. For what felt like the longest second, his gaze darted to your lips. That’s when your adrenaline kicked in, and before you could stop yourself your lips were pressed against his.

Peter was surprised, but he almost immediately returned the kiss, throwing his gun on the floor and grabbing your waist with such enthusiasm that your feet lifted from the ground. You smiled into the kiss.

As an intergalactic battle raged around you, you two only cared about not letting go.

For what felt like the longest second, his gaze darted to your lips. That’s when your adrenaline kicked in, and before you could stop yourself your lips were pressed against his.

Peter was surprised, but he almost immediately returned the kiss, throwing his gun on the floor and grabbing your waist with such enthusiasm that your feet lifted from the ground. You smiled into the kiss.

As an intergalactic battle raged around you, you two only cared about not letting go.
trail.content_abstract:
• pairing: Peter Parker x reader
  • category: fluff
  • words: 540+
  • synopsis: he takes you lasertagging and kisses you in a corner

day #7: “are you in?” from @ibwhellospring ‘s Spring Short Story Writing Event. This is for the anon who wanted some Peter fluff <3

title: ⚠️End game spoilers⚠️
body: Am I the only one who feels bad for Pepper and Peter. Pepper always wanted tony to stay with her. And was worried about him dying. He finally stop and had a kid. But he goes back to try and save folks which she told him too. And he ends up dead. Like poor pepper. And peter who was bitten by a radioactive spider and gets power which he use to save folks. Then he is saving the world with every one else. They fail he gets dusted and comes back to watch his mentor and some who was like a dad die right in front of him. Like give Peter and Pepper and break Russo Brothers

body:
Warning: Endgame Spoilers

Tony, in the afterlife: “I can finally rest knowing those I love are safe”

Peter: *fighting mysterio and the giant monsters by himself*

“guess we all die eventually lmao YEET!”

*gets knocked tf out*

Tony, rising from the dead: “GOD DAMMIT PETER!!”
